de.tum.in.tumcampus.activities.generic

Class ActivityForDownloadingExternal

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • android.support.v7.app.ActionBarActivity
                • de.tum.in.tumcampus.activities.generic.ProgressActivity
                  • de.tum.in.tumcampus.activities.generic.ActivityForDownloadingExternal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, uk.co.senab.actionbarpulltorefresh.library.listeners.OnRefreshListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CafeteriaActivity, NewsActivity

    public abstract class ActivityForDownloadingExternal
extends ProgressActivity
    Generic class which handles all basic tasks to download JSON or files from an external source. It uses the DownloadService to download from external and implements a rich user feedback with error progress and token related layouts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActivityForDownloadingExternal

        public ActivityForDownloadingExternal(java.lang.String method,
                              int layoutId)
        Standard constructor for ActivityForAccessingTumOnline. The given layout must include a progress_layout, failed_layout, no_token_layout and an error_layout. If the Activity should support Pull-To-Refresh it can also contain a PullToRefreshLayout named ptr_layout
        Parameters:
        method - Type of content to be downloaded
        layoutId - Resource id of the xml layout that should be used to inflate the activity

      • requestDownload

        public void requestDownload(boolean forceDownload)
        Start a download of the specified type
        Parameters:
        forceDownload - If set to true if will force the download service to throw away cached data and re-download instead.
